question:
[Jamie] and her sister, [Mary], frequently bicker. However, they always make up quickly. [Gregory] is proud that his daughter is such a good student. Her name is [Cecil]. [Daniel] took his son [Richard] and daughter [Nola] out to eat. [Jamie], [Nola]'s mother, joined them later on. [Sarah] spent a great day shopping with her daughter, [Mary]. [Daniel] took his son [Richard] out for ice cream. [Gregory] was thrilled his brother, [Daniel], was able to make it to the party.
Question: How is [Cecil] related to [Sarah]?
